title: Remove Deadlines, Admin Status Control, Document Downloads, Compliance Deliverables, UI Text & Form Updates

requirements.text: Remove the Deadline feature entirely from the application. This includes removing the Deadline tab from the client-facing ComplianceDashboardPage and ClientTasksTab, removing the Deadline tab from ComplianceAdminDashboardPage, removing ComplianceAdminDeadlineCountdown and ClientCreateDeadlineForm components from active use, removing deadline-related backend methods (createDeadline, getDeadlines, updateDeadlineStatus, etc.) from main.mo, and hiding all deadline-related UI elements. Retain the data type in migration.mo only if needed to preserve existing data.
acceptanceCriteria: No Deadline tab appears in the client compliance dashboard
No Deadline tab appears in the admin compliance dashboard
No deadline creation forms are accessible to clients or admins
Backend no longer exposes deadline CRUD endpoints
TaskStatusSelect component no longer includes a Deadline status select
Navigation and all tabbed UIs show no trace of the Deadline section

requirements.text: Enable admins to change the statuses of To-Dos, Timelines, Follow-Ups, and Deadlines (while Deadlines exist) from the admin compliance dashboard. The ComplianceAdminToDoList, ComplianceAdminTimeline, ComplianceAdminFollowUp, and ComplianceAdminDeadlineCountdown components (prior to deadline removal) must render inline status selectors using the existing TaskStatusSelect component or equivalent. The admin actor must be authorized to call the existing updateToDoStatus, updateTimelineStatus, updateFollowUpStatus backend methods.

quotes: Admin can also change the statuses on your To-Dos, Timelines, Follow-Ups, and Deadlines

acceptanceCriteria: Admin can change the status of any To-Do item from the admin compliance dashboard
Admin can change the status of any Timeline entry from the admin compliance dashboard
Admin can change the status of any Follow-Up item from the admin compliance dashboard
Status changes made by admin are persisted in the backend
Status updates reflect immediately in the UI (optimistic update or refetch)

requirements.text: Ensure that documents uploaded by clients and received by the admin are downloaded in their original format. In the DocumentTable component and AdminDashboardPage documents tab, the download action must preserve the original file's MIME type and filename extension. The backend must store and return the original content type with each document blob, and the download link or function must set the correct Content-Disposition and MIME type so the browser downloads the file in its original form (PDF, XLSX, etc.).

quotes: Documents Received by the admin should be downloaded in the same form as received

acceptanceCriteria: A PDF uploaded by a client downloads as a PDF for the admin
An XLSX uploaded by a client downloads as an XLSX for the admin
The downloaded filename matches the original upload filename
No format conversion or data loss occurs during download

requirements.text: Allow both clients and admins to add Compliance Deliverables and approve or reject them. On the client side, the existing ClientDeliverableForm must remain accessible. On the admin side, add a form or dialog in the AdminDashboardPage (Client Deliverables tab) that allows the admin to create a new compliance deliverable on behalf of any client. Both clients and admins must be able to approve or reject deliverables via approve/reject action buttons. The backend's submitClientDeliverable and updateClientDeliverableStatus methods must authorize both the client principal and the admin principal to perform these operations.

quotes: Clint and Admin can Add Compliance Deliverables and Approve and reject them

acceptanceCriteria: Client can submit a new compliance deliverable from the client portal
Admin can submit a new compliance deliverable from the admin dashboard
Client can approve or reject a deliverable
Admin can approve or reject a deliverable
Approve and reject actions update the deliverable status in the backend
Both client and admin UIs reflect the updated status after action

requirements.text: Change the text 'Join Us as a Client Today' to 'Contact Us' everywhere it appears in the frontend, including buttons, headings, and any labels on the HomePage or any other page.

quotes: Change 'Join Us as a Client Today' to 'Contact Us'

acceptanceCriteria: No instance of 'Join Us as a Client Today' appears anywhere in the UI
All occurrences are replaced with 'Contact Us'

requirements.text: Make the Phone Number field non-mandatory in the ServiceRequestForm, VisitorServiceRequestPage form, and UserProfileSetup modal. Remove the required validation constraint from the phone number input field. The form must be submittable without entering a phone number.

quotes: Make Phone No. as not mandatory to write

acceptanceCriteria: The phone number field does not show a required indicator
Submitting a service request or profile setup form without a phone number succeeds
No validation error is shown when phone number is left blank

requirements.text: In the Admin Dashboard's Client Submitted Deliverables tab, update the AdminClientDeliverableTable component to display a link or button that allows the admin to view or download the uploaded document file associated with each deliverable. The file URL or blob stored with the deliverable must be surfaced in the table row, and clicking it should open or download the document.

quotes: In Client Submitted Deliverables Admin is Able to Also see the uploaded document

acceptanceCriteria: Each row in the AdminClientDeliverableTable shows a view/download link or button for the attached document
Clicking the link opens or downloads the document file
Rows without an attached document show an appropriate placeholder or no link
The document is accessible in its original format

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
Deadline data migration logic in migration.mo must not break existing stored data during canister upgrade
Backend must remain a single actor in backend/main.mo
nonGoals: Adding any new authentication mechanisms beyond Internet Identity
Redesigning the overall visual theme or layout
Adding real-time notifications or WebSocket features
